Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 21st overall pick, by Texas in 1980...
Injured on 4/5/1980 with a Jammed Finger, out for one week...
Injured on 8/7/1982 with a Broken Jaw, out for 4-5 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/15/1983, off John Sutton (MIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/20/1984, off Marty Bystrom (BOS)...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Detroit on 4/9/1989...
Won World Series with Texas in 1989...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/1/1990 to a 3-year deal worth $1,030,000 per year...
